comments:
Download report engine runtime birt-runtime-2.1.3-N20070524.zip, set up BIRT_HOME, and run birt-runtime-2_1_3\ReportEngine\genReport.bat to run any report design. A ClassNotFoundException (stack below) is shown. This is caused by Genreport.BAT file adding this entry to the class path: %BIRT_HOME%\ReportEngine\lib\com.ibm.icu_3.4.5.jar. However in the lib directory the actual lib file name is com.ibm.icu_3.6.0.20061215.jar.
